name: Parcel Run
description:
In the near future, delivering parcels is a crime! Only a select few corporations are allowed and you’re not one of them. But that’s not about to stop you from trying! The authorities will stop you, of course - but you’ll put up one heck of a show before then!

How to Play

Run around town to locate post boxes with packages to be sent, pick them up, and take them to the correct house! Simple enough, eh? The more packages you deliver, the more the authorities will send in people to stop you. Things don't stay simple for long.

  • Arrows/WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Throw Package

Keep playing until you run out of hearts. If you're finding things too easy or too difficult, try going to the settings menu and changing your starting health.

Q: How do I win?
A: You cannot win, you will eventually get caught

Q: How do I hurt the enemies?
A: You cannot hurt the enemies, they can only hurt you

Q: How do I get health back?
A: You cannot get health back, it only goes down

Q: Wow, it kinda sounds like losing is an inevitability! 
A: Yes, the best you can do is delay it ;)
